aboutDescription: Team Vibhav is the official departmental team of the Electronics & Communication Engineering Department at NIT Hamirpur, dedicated to contributing to Nimbus, the instituteâ€™s annual technical festival. As a team, we cultivate a spirit of innovation, teamwork, and technical excellence, fostering an environment where students can develop and showcase their skills in electronics, robotics, embedded systems, and cutting-edge technologies. At Team Vibhav, we believe in nurturing a deep and genuine commitment toward technological advancements. Our diverse pool of talented students continuously explores new ideas, pushing the boundaries of what is possible. Whether it's designing intelligent automation systems, IoT-based applications, or futuristic electronic projects, we encourage creativity and hands-on learning.
name: Name

faqs.question: How can I apply for a job as a worker?
faqs.answer: To apply for a job, simply browse the map to find available positions. Click on the job marker to view details such as location, wages, and requirements. If the job suits you, fill out the application form and submit it. You will be notified about the status of your application.

faqs.question: How do hirers create a job post?
faqs.answer: Hirers can create a job post by filling out a simple form on the website. The form includes details like the job location, available posts (positions), wages, and more. Once submitted, your job post will be visible on the map for workers to apply.

faqs.question: Can a hirer see who applied for the job?
faqs.answer: Yes, hirers can track applicants and view their details (name, contact info, etc.) through the hirer's dashboard. The hirer can also manage and review the applications directly.

faqs.question: How can I track the history of the workers I hired?
faqs.answer: Hirers can view their hiring history on the Hirer History page. This page shows the details of workers they have hired, including names, contact information, and job specifics.

faqs.question: Can I apply for multiple jobs as a worker?
faqs.answer: Yes, workers can apply for multiple jobs, provided they meet the job requirements and there are available positions.

description: Hirers can create job posts, and workers can apply for jobs easily.
